quotes.text: Truth is the most valuable thing we have.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Those who know the truth are best able to do their duty.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Truth is always strong, no matter how weak it may appear.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Truth is the foundation of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Truth is not always popular, but it is always right.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Speak the truth, even if your voice shakes.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Truth is the foundation of all wisdom and the cornerstone of character.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The truth is rarely pure and never simple.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Truth is the highest thing that man may keep.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Truth is the first casualty of war.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The truth will set you free, but first it will make you miserable.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Truth is the foundation of all knowledge.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Truth is like a lion; you don't have to defend it. Let it loose; it will defend itself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: If someone is able to show me that what I think or do is not right, I will happily change, for I seek the truth.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The truth is so obscure in these times, and falsehood so established, that unless we love the truth, we cannot know it.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Truth never damages a cause that is just.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The truth will set you free.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Truth is the daughter of time.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Truth is the beginning of every good thing.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its boots.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Take responsibility for your actions.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: With great power comes great responsibility.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Responsibility is the price of freedom.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: The price of greatness is responsibility.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: You are responsible for your own happiness.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Courage is the first of human qualities.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: The brave may not live forever, but the cautious do not live at all.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Courage is grace under pressure.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The way to Heaven is ascending; we must be content to travel uphill.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Courage is the power to let go of the familiar.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: The first and best victory is to conquer self.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Courage is not having the strength to go on; it is going on when you don't have the strength.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Be brave enough to be different.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the judgment that something else is more important than fear.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Courage is the discovery that you may not win, and trying when you know you can lose.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can't practice any other virtue consistently.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but action in spite of it.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Fortune favors the bold.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The greatest among you will be your servant.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: A humble person is never humiliated.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Pride goes before destruction.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Humility is the foundation of all virtues.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: The purpose of life is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: The wise find pleasure in water; the virtuous find pleasure in hills.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: A wise man learns from his mistakes, a wiser man learns from others'.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: What is the meaning of life? To be happy and useful.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Man's search for meaning is the primary motivation in his life.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The race is not always to the swift, but to those who keep on running.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The time is always right to do what is right.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Integrity is the most valuable and respected quality of leadership.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Integrity is not a conditional word. It doesn't blow in the wind or change with the weather.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Compassion is the basis of morality.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Compassion is the radicalism of our time.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Compassion is not a relationship between the healer and the wounded. It's a relationship between equals.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Patience is not the ability to wait, but the ability to keep a good attitude while waiting.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Have patience with all things, but chiefly have patience with yourself.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all others.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The unthankful heart discovers no mercies; but the thankful heart will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings to be grateful for.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Inner peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person or event to control your emotions.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Where there is no vision, the people perish.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Hope is the anchor of the soul.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Hope is a waking dream.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Hope is the thing with feathers that perches in the soul.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The beginning of wisdom is the fear of the Lord.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Confession is good for the soul.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Repentance is not just feeling sorry, but turning away from sin.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: A man who won't admit his mistakes can never be corrected.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: The first step to wisdom is admitting you don't know.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: More things are wrought by prayer than this world dreams of.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Prayer is not asking. It is a longing of the soul.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Prayer is not asking for what you think you want, but asking to be changed in ways you can't imagine.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Grace is not a little prayer you chant before receiving a meal. It's a way to live.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Grace is the free, unmerited favor of God.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Grace is love that cares and stoops and rescues.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Grace is not opposed to effort, it is opposed to earning.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Grace is the face that love wears when it meets imperfection.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Salvation is not a reward for the righteous, it is a gift for the guilty.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Salvation is by grace alone, through faith alone, in Christ alone.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: The cross is the place where God's love and God's justice meet.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: God's love is not conditional on our performance.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Worship is the submission of all of our nature to God.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Worship is the act of loving God back.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: The highest form of worship is the worship of unselfish Christian service.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Worship is not about what we get out of it, but what we put into it.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: True worship is a lifestyle, not just a service.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Faith is the art of holding on to things your reason has once accepted.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Redemption is the restoration of man to the favor of God.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Redemption is God's way of making all things new.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: In redemption, we find not only forgiveness but transformation.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Redemption is not perfection. The redeemed must realize their brokenness.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The process of sanctification is the process of becoming more like Christ.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Sanctification is the evidence of the new birth.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Sanctification is not the work of a day, but of a lifetime.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Sanctification is both a gift and a goal.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Sanctification is the work of God's free grace, whereby we are renewed in the whole man.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The fellowship of believers is a foretaste of heaven.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: True fellowship is found in the unity of the Spirit.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Fellowship is the sharing of life together in Christ.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Fellowship is not just about being together, but about being one in purpose.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Fellowship is the bond that unites the body of Christ.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Your testimony is the story of God's grace in your life.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Your testimony is your greatest tool for evangelism.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: The most powerful testimony is a life transformed by grace.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: A testimony is not about how good you are, but about how good God is.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: A testimony is the evidence of God's faithfulness.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Blessings are not always what we expect, but they are always what we need.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: A blessing is not just a wish, but a divine favor.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Blessings flow from a heart of gratitude.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The greatest blessing is to be a blessing to others.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Blessed are the pure in heart, for they will see God.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Mindfulness is the aware, balanced acceptance of the present experience.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Mindfulness is about being fully awake in our lives.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Mindfulness is a way of befriending ourselves and our experience.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Wherever you are, be there totally.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Resilience is the capacity to recover quickly from difficulties.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: You have been assigned this mountain to show others it can be moved.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Resilience is not about bouncing back, it's about bouncing forward.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Resilience is accepting your new reality, even if it's less good than the one you had before.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: The only way to grow is to challenge yourself.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: The moment you stop growing, you start dying.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Growth begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don't belong.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Personal growth is not a matter of learning new information but of unlearning old limits.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The creative adult is the child who survived.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Creativity is the way I share my soul with the world.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Innovation is the ability to see change as an opportunity, not a threat.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Innovation is the specific instrument of entrepreneurship.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Productivity is not about doing more things, it's about doing the right things.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Productivity is being able to do things that you were never able to do before.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Where focus goes, energy flows.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Focus is not about being busy, it's about being effective.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Focus is the key to productivity.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Focus is not about saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. It's about saying no to the hundred other good ideas.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Discipline is the foundation upon which all success is built.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The price of excellence is discipline. The cost of mediocrity is disappointment.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Self-discipline is the magic power that makes you virtually unstoppable.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Excellence is the unlimited ability to improve the quality of what you have to offer.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.

quotes.text: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

quotes.text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.

quotes.text: For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.

quotes.text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.

quotes.text: Wait on the Lord: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the Lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Wait on the Lord: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the Lord.

quotes.text: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.

quotes.text: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

quotes.text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

quotes.text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us.

quotes.text: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

quotes.text: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

quotes.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

quotes.text: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

quotes.text: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.

quotes.text: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

quotes.text: The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.

quotes.text: Blessed be God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies, and the God of all comfort.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Blessed be God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies, and the God of all comfort.

quotes.text: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

quotes.text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.

quotes.text: Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the Lord thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the Lord thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.

quotes.text: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the Lord thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the Lord thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.

quotes.text: Seek the Lord and his strength, seek his face continually.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Seek the Lord and his strength, seek his face continually.

quotes.text: The Lord is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.

quotes.text: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the Lord Jehovah is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the Lord Jehovah is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.

quotes.text: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

quotes.text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.

quotes.text: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

quotes.text: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.

quotes.text: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.

quotes.text: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up.

quotes.text: Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.

quotes.text: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.

quotes.text: We love him, because he first loved us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: We love him, because he first loved us.

quotes.text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another.

quotes.text: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

quotes.text: A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.

quotes.text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.

quotes.text: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.

quotes.text: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.

quotes.text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.

quotes.text: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

quotes.text: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

quotes.text: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.

quotes.text: A man's heart deviseth his way: but the Lord directeth his steps.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A man's heart deviseth his way: but the Lord directeth his steps.

quotes.text: And thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.

quotes.text: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

quotes.text: For the Lord giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For the Lord giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.

quotes.text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

quotes.text: Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and show thee great and mighty things, which thou knowest not.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and show thee great and mighty things, which thou knowest not.

quotes.text: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.

quotes.text: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

quotes.text: Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.

quotes.text: Trust ye in the Lord for ever: for in the Lord Jehovah is everlasting strength.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Trust ye in the Lord for ever: for in the Lord Jehovah is everlasting strength.

quotes.text: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.

quotes.text: The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.

quotes.text: And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, Lord, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, Lord, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.

quotes.text: The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the Lord shall be safe.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the Lord shall be safe.

quotes.text: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.

quotes.text: And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.

quotes.text: Pray without ceasing.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Pray without ceasing.

quotes.text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

quotes.text: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.

quotes.text: The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.

quotes.text: Then shall ye call upon me, and ye shall go and pray unto me, and I will hearken unto you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Then shall ye call upon me, and ye shall go and pray unto me, and I will hearken unto you.

quotes.text: Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.

quotes.text: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us.

quotes.text: I have called upon thee, for thou wilt hear me, O God: incline thine ear unto me, and hear my speech.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I have called upon thee, for thou wilt hear me, O God: incline thine ear unto me, and hear my speech.

quotes.text: And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
